price: Eto toliko! Pa ko poštuje Allahove propise – znak je čestita srca.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقۡوَى ٱلۡقُلُوبِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika waman yuʿaẓẓim shaʿāira al-lahi fa-innahā min taqwā al-qulūbi
